targets.expr: avg((avg (k8s_pod_memory_working_set_By{cluster_name=~"$cluster",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace", k8s_pod_name=~"$pod"}) by (k8s_pod_name))/ on (k8s_pod_name)(avg (k8s_pod_memory_usage_By{cluster_name=~"$cluster",k8s_namespace_name=~"$namespace", k8s_pod_name=~"$pod"}) by (k8s_pod_name))*100) by (k8s_pod_name)
